name: Marmeladenrenner
description:
Marmeladenrenner

An Endless Runner created in a 48h Unreal Game Jam by current/former students of the S4G School for Games.

The game is in German just for fun, so don't be surprised.

The character runs by itself, you can look around with the mouse and run left and right. He can shoot and has a wallrun and ledge grab.
